channel.title: drink on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in drink on Family Recipes

item.title: Pineapple Orange Punch
item.description: Add pineapple juice, light rum, dark rum, and orange juice to a shaker and shake to combine. Pour into a collins glass and top with sprite. Optionally, add a pineapple slice to the rim for garnish.

item.title: Margarita
item.description: Combine lime juice, orange liquor, tequila, salt, and sugar in a shaker with an ice cube and shake vigorously until the ice cube has melted. Pour into a tumbler glass filled with ice. Pour splash of fruited liquor over the top. This recipe also works with mezcal instead of tequila.
